Uses of Class
edu.rit.pj.reduction.SharedFloatArray

Packages that use SharedFloatArray
edu.rit.mp Package edu.rit.mp contains the Message Protocol (MP), a transport layer protocol for sending messages using TCP. 
edu.rit.mp.buf Package edu.rit.mp.buf contains message buffer classes for sending and receiving messages using the Message Protocol (MP). 
 

Uses of SharedFloatArray in edu.rit.mp
 

Methods in edu.rit.mp with parameters of type SharedFloatArray
static FloatBuf FloatBuf.buffer(SharedFloatArray theArray)
          Create a buffer for the entire given shared float array.
static FloatBuf FloatBuf.sliceBuffer(SharedFloatArray theArray, Range theRange)
          Create a buffer for one slice of the given shared float array.
static FloatBuf[] FloatBuf.sliceBuffers(SharedFloatArray theArray, Range[] theRanges)
          Create an array of buffers for multiple slices of the given shared float array.
